operations.summary: List Audit Logs for Date Range
operations.notes: Returns all logs for given date range

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start index of the return list, default as 0

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The size of the return list, default as 50

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The property by which the returned list is sorted, default as 'startTime'

operations.summary: List global Audit Logs for Date Range
operations.notes: Returns all logs for given date range

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start index of the return list, default as 0

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The size of the return list, default as 50

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The property by which the returned list is sorted, default as 'startTime'
